name: Orbit Colonizer
description:
All the life in the universe was dissimated by Andramelech, a monster. Your race was the only remain and discovered a way to restore the life in the universe. Escape the monster and restore the life in the planets!

Controls:

Left arrow to decrease orbit speed.

Right arrow to increasse orbit speed.

Hold Space to charge the spaceship force.

Release Space to exit the orbit of a planet.
